verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: again] [V: directed] [ARG1: his weekly Saturday breakfast tweets] [ARG2: at the media] , [ARGM-PRD: this time chiding " Meet the Press " host Chuck Todd for exploring potential Russian meddling in the 2016 election] .

[ARG0: President Trump] again directed his weekly Saturday breakfast tweets at the media , [ARGM-TMP: this time] [V: chiding] [ARG1: " Meet the Press " host Chuck Todd] [ARG2: for exploring potential Russian meddling in the 2016 election] .
